comments.tweet: @ACTBrigitte Yes and as with information security, an industry cannot ever get to a 0% risk situation. It’s not a question of if there will be a breach, but when. Likewise, if a community is keeping viruses in a lab, even the most strict biosafety measures aren’t infallible.
